activities:
When relevant in implementation, operation, maintenance and support of our hosted software applications for the benefit of our customers, Kiran Analytics may access and receive information, including personal, non-public information, concerning individuals and entities that our customers choose to include in their application. Information collected may be used for a number of purposes including populating employees’ profiles in their application environment to allow them access to their solutions, customer service, maintenance and support. 

Kiran Analytics may also access or obtain information from customers as part of Kiran Analytics services, including consulting, education, support, and hosting. In connection with these services, Kiran Analytics does not control the data and any access to or use of such data is solely incidental to complying with its customer commitments.
